Its task is to see to the appropriateness of ORG health care services by , inter alia , monitoring the activities of health care professionals , according to ORG ( laki terveydenhuollon ammattihenkilöistä , lagen om yrkesutbildade personer inom hälso- och sjukvården DATE ) . The ORG receives information about inadequacies observed in professional practice for example from ORG notifications and complaints , the authorities , ORG , pharmacies , employers , and courts of law . The ORG has at its disposal CARDINAL permanent specialists who represent expertise in the various fields of medicine .

CARDINAL . The ORG gives administrative guidance to the health care professionals in the form of calling a health care professional ’s attention to some feature in his or her actions , or presenting him or her with a caution . The ORG can also issue a professional a written warning , restrict a person ’s right to practise the profession , or entirely revoke such a right .
